title: Can I modify or cancel my registration?
description: If you need to modify or cancel your registration, please email us at registration@stripesessions.com.

title: How can I sign up for specific breakout talks?
description: We’ll launch the Sessions mobile app two weeks before the event, at which time you’ll be able to sign up for talks within the app.

title: Can I participate as a sponsor of the event?
description: To learn more about becoming a sponsor, review the 2024 prospectus and email us at sessions-sponsor@stripe.com.

title: Can I request an accommodation to attend the event?
description:
We’re happy to make any reasonable accommodations you may need to attend Sessions.

The following will be available on-site:

  • Captioning
  • Lactation room
  • All-gender restrooms
  • Vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options at all meals

We can accommodate other dietary requirements—including kosher for Passover and halal—which you can request when completing your Sessions registration.


If you would like to request other accommodations not listed, please email us at registration@stripesessions.com.

title: How can I book a room at one of the Sessions hotels?
description: You will receive a link to book a hotel room at a discounted rate in your registration confirmation email.

title: I have additional questions that weren’t covered here; whom can I contact?
description: We’re here to help. Reach out to us at registration@stripesessions.com.
